data.text: @stlouisfed From absurd fiscal policies and far too easy monetary policy. THAT is the cause. Biden signed the American Inflation Act in March of 2021, and then the Fed made a major, and obvious policy mistake by continuing to buy bonds and keeping the Funds rate at zero.
@stlouisfed Previously supply-pull inflation. Now looks demand-pull inflation starting. Will there be combine supply and demand pull inflation on the way ? How should we play this scenario ?
@stlouisfed Increase in demand? Go f yourself.
